Text:
@ scolios

Most of dabadguy69 movies have not been surround sound. Disappointing. I'm hoping this movie is.  It would be a shame if it isn't
Can anyone please confirm if there's surround sound please?

@ dabadguy69

Can you please confirm if this is surround sound?  Of all movies to start encoding with surround sound - this movie would be it.  Thanks so much for your quality uploads!
unfortunately I can confirm that this is NOT surround sound.  :(
